description:
From the maker of the famous Pelican® cases, this Micro Case is perfect for storing phones, GPS units, radios, etc. It is waterproof, dustproof, and crush-resistant, and has an automatic purge valve to accommodate pressure changes caused by changes in altitude or weather systems.

  • Made of rugged transparent polycarbonate
  • In direct sunlight, the air inside a transparent case heats up and causes condensation, to reduce this use desiccant packs
  • Inside dimensions are 21 x 11 x 6cm
  • Outside dimensions are 24 x 14 x 7cm
  • Great for rugged sports. Not for swimming or submerging
  • IPX7 rated to protect against heavy rains and quick dips up to 1m
  • Both the Pelican warranty and MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee cover this case itself. Neither guarantee covers the contents you put inside the case
name: Pelican 1060 Micro Case
